description: A handy sword made out of remains of BL9 tendril's blades
A unique BL9-infused quarterstaff upon pressing handle of which emits stunning stream of BL9
A whip made out of a BL9 worm-like parasite that is capable of stretching and swinging itself
Sturdy razor-sharp claws made out of remains of the Blind Clawer's claws infused with BL9
A very strong and a durable spear made out of remains of Repto's claws
A very sharp sword with multiple protrusions on it made out of BL9 spike samples
A razor sharp, very well piercing whip made out of BL9 Assassin's tail samples
A huge axe that somehow this strange tentacle sample manages to take the form of, forming both the long handle and a huge blade
A unique enhanced BL9-infused quarterstaff upon pressing handle of which emits stunning stream of BL9

A highly experimental futuristic blade with a unique design upon pressing handle of which uses BL9 capable of changing it's physical and chemical structure to cause various offensive effects, in this case, stream of stunning BL9

A unique, refined incredibly enhanced BL9-infused quarterstaff upon pressing handle of which emits stunning stream of BL9

hit_you_effect.npc_message: As %1$s stabs with the pike it emits electrified arcs of BL9 at %2$s wildly!

description: THIS GOES KABOOOOOOOM.
THIS IS KABOOOOOOMMMMIIINNNGGGG

A soldering iron that has somehow been infused with the entirely sentient BL9 that somehow mentally communicates with you, it is covered and entirely reinforced with it's thick tissue with multiple spiky almost unnoticeabely vibrating protrusions that give it a more intimidating, animate look,
